entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
